B

buzz(int, int) - Method in class com.finch4alice.FinchHTTP
Plays a tone at the specified frequency for the specified duration on the Finch's internal buzzer.
buzzAndWait(int, int) - Method in class com.finch4alice.FinchHTTP
Plays a tone at the specified frequency for the specified duration on the Finch's internal buzzer, and blocks until complete.

R
